channel.title: Pages on Silmaril's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Silmaril's Blog

item.title: About
item.description: About Myself My name is Benoit Plessis and this is my blog. I’ve been a system administrator and engineer for almost twenty years now, mostly running internet websites and this is my first real online presence :) I am currently head of system and network infrastructure at New Oxatis a company providing SaaS solutions for retail services. Areas of interest Books, mostly SF genre (Frank Herbert’s Dune, Dan Simmons’s Hyperion, Isaac Asimov Fondation, …) but also Fantasy (Tolkien, Terry Goodkind, …) Horses I’m also an amateur photograph 500px Contacts Social Medias:
